author: Reuters Editorial
title: Australia's ANZ appoints Alexis George as deputy CEO
text:
(Reuters) - Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd on Wednesday named Alexis George as deputy chief executive, in place of Graham Hodges who announced his retirement last month.
FILE PHOTO: A man walks past a branch of the Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd (ANZ) in Sydney October 29, 2013. REUTERS/David Gray/File Photo George, who joined as managing director of insurance in 2013, will continue in her role as group executive, Wealth Australia, the countryâ€™s third-largest bank by market value said in a statement.
The appointment is effective May 15, the lender said.
Reporting by Aditya Soni in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier
